Best Western Global Free Night Voucher

Issued 05/20/2015
Valid Thru 12/04/2015
Hotel Point Level 16000
Voucher No 7478930993
Sequence No 0001

Conditions for Use

  • Valid for single or double occupancy.
  • This voucher entitles the bearer to one room night's free accommodation. User will be responsible for any separate charges incurred, such as food and beverage, movie rental, etc.
  • The user will not be charged for room taxes. Other tax liabilities, if any, are the responsibility of the user.
  • Voucher is not exchangeable for cash in part or whole, and no change will be given.
  • Valid for 6 months from date of issue.
  • This voucher can not be used in conjunction with any other offer.
  • Voucher can only be used once.
  • Best Western Global Free Room Night accommodations are subject to capacity controls, which may limit the availability of rooms offered at Best Western hotels.
  • Subject to lodging establishment room availability.
  • Austrailian cardholders must call 131 779 to make a reservation.

Best Western: The World's Biggest Hotel Family®. This Global Free Room Nighth Voucher must be presented upon arrival at the hotel and is subject to availability. When making your reservation, please clearly state that a Global Free Room Night Voucher will be used as payment. Best Western Rewards® is owned and operated by BW GCCI Inc, a wholly owned subsidiary of Best Western International, Inc. All Best Western hotels are independently owned and operated.
